name: Lemon Bars
author: Shari Landewe
instructions: Mix together cake mix, oil, and 1 egg until crumbly. Reserve 1 cup for topping. Press the rest into a greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 350Â° for 12 minutes. In a separate bowl, beat cream cheese, 1/3 cup sugar, lemon juice and 1 egg. When crumb mixture is done, spread cream cheese mixture over the top. Mix 1/3 cup of sugar with reserved crumb mixture. Sprinkle on top of cream cheese and bake 12 minutes more. Let cool, then chill before cutting.
